name: AOS Animation for SiteOrigin Page Builder
author: Covalenciawebs

sections.description:
This plugin adds customizable animation to any widget and row of SiteOrigin Page Builder.

It’s based on free AOS animation library. You can set:
– Animation type.
– Duration.
– Delay.
– Easing.
– Anchor.

Configuration

Once the extension is installed go to a page or post built with Page Builder and will find the animation options.

Edit the widget, row or cell, and in the right sidebar you will see a new menu element “AOS Animation”. There you can set:
– Animation type.
– Duration.
– Delay.
– Easing.
– Anchor.
– Repeat.
sections.installation:
1. Upload cvw-pb-animation folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. It doesn’t have any page configuration.
sections.changelog:

  • Fixed jQuery 3.x compatibility

1.2 – 2020-07-13

  • Added animation to cell

1.11 – 2020-07-08

  • Fixed css issue in mobile version

1.1 – 2020-02-02

  • Update to php 7.2

1.0 – 2019-04-26

  • Release – Initial release
